contents.description: Measured or calculated actual apparent power consumption including all auxiliary components (e.g. on a compressor including fans, controller, …).

contents.name: Current
contents.description: Measured or calculated actual root mean square of the electric power consumption including all auxiliary components (e.g. on a compressor including fans, controller, …).

contents.name: Energy
contents.description: Measured or calculated accumulated electrical energy consumed including all auxiliary components (e.g. on a compressor including fans, controller, …) since last reset.

contents.name: Power
contents.description: Measured or calculated actual electric real power consumption including all auxiliary components (e.g. on a compressor including fans, controller, …).

contents.name: Voltage
contents.description: Measured or calculated actual root mean square of the voltage applied including all auxiliary components (e.g. on a compressor including fans, controller, …).

contents.name: ResetStatistics
contents.description: Restarts all statistical data, including a reset of the StartTime to the current time.

description: Data for statistics applications for the topology element.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 1.00.1 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 01/09/2026 15:14:56 UTC

contents.name: ResetCondition
contents.description: The reason and context for the reset of the statistics, which is done without a trigger from an OPC UA Client, like calling the ResetStatistics Method. ResetCondition is a vendor-specific, human readable string. ResetCondition is non-localized and might contain an expression that can be parsed by certain clients. Examples are: “AFTER 4 HOURS”, “AFTER 1000 ITEMS”, “OPERATOR”. “OPERATOR” means, that an operator resets the statistics on a local HMI.

contents.name: StartTime
contents.description: Indicates the point in time at which the collection of the statistical data has been started.

contents.name: RealTime
contents.description: Real time passed since last counter reset.

contents.name: RealTimeToNextService
contents.description: Real time left until the real time of the next service level is exceeded.

contents.name: RunningTime
contents.description: Time spent running since last counter reset.

contents.name: RunningTimeToNextService
contents.description: Running time left until the running time of the next service level is exceeded.

contents.name: ResetStatistics
contents.description: Restarts all statistical data, including a reset of the StartTime to the current time.

contents.name: UnloadedTime
contents.description: Time spent in unloaded state since last counter reset.

description: In a compressed air system the airnet describes the piping, including valves and vessels, and all components between the inlet of the compressed air station and the distribution point to the customer, including compressors, dryers, filters, etc. A compressed air system may contain several airnets and it’s possible for the master control system to manage all airnets simultaniously. A component, like a compressor, must not be assigned to more than one airnet.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 1.00.1 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 01/09/2026 15:14:56 UTC
